sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useEffect } from 'react' import Navbar from './Navbar' import Pic from './Pic' import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import productcontext from '../context/Productcontext' export default function Success() { const{getorder,order,setspinner,total}=useContext(productcontext) useEffect(()=>{ setspinner(true) getorder() },[]) return ( <> { order.length === 0?setspinner(true):setspinner(false)}
Your order has been placed

Order Id.

{order.length ===0 ?"":order[order.length-1]._id }

Total

{order.length === 0 ? "": total }

Continue Shopping
) }
